info.sourceTextContent:
Mosotro no son casá por le iglese. Elle e carretiller, que vende agua, y yo vende carne, mantec, güeve, frute, tóo que pué.
--¿Cómo se llama Vd.?
--Me ñama Ginoveve Santa Crú. Mi marío e Tribusio Polanca. Elle tien uno sijo ñamao Malanga que ha sacao mala cabesa.
info.suspiciousTextContent:
We are not married through the church. He sells things on a cart, sells water, and I sell meat, lard, guavas, fruit, anything I can.
What is your name?
My name is Ginovese Santa Cru.
My husband is Tribusio Polanca.
He has one child named Malanga who turned out to be difficult
